Classes

class  mmdb::mmcif::Category
 mmcif::Category is a base class for mmcif::Struct and mmcif::Loop, implementations of mmCIF's "structure" and "loop" categories. More...
class  mmdb::mmcif::Struct
 mmcif::Struct represents mmCIF's "structure" category, where data follows directly the corresponding tag. More...
class  mmdb::mmcif::Loop
 mmcif::Loop represents mmCIF's "loop" category, which keeps rows of data values associated with tags. More...
class  mmdb::mmcif::Data
 mmcif::Data represents mmCIF's "data" category, which keeps structures and loops and is mandatory element of mmCIF file. More...
class  mmdb::mmcif::File
